data.meta_description: sport-and-physical-culture-in-canadian-society-2nbsped-0134682904-9780134682907_compress - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an overview of a book dedicated to Heather, Emma, Christopher, Desir√©e, and Bailey. It contains 9 chapters that discuss topics related to sport and physical culture from a sociological perspective, including thinking sociologically, sport and social stratification, sex, gender and sexuality in sport, physical culture, ethnicity and race in Canada, youth sport, deviance and sport, and violence and sport. Each chapter contains learning objectives, introductions to key topics, theories and frameworks for analysis, examples, conclusions, and suggestions for further reading.
